sentences.english: I know many stars like to keep their relationships off of the red carpet.
sentences.chinese: 我知道很多明星都願意把自己的感情藏在紅毯下面。

sentences.english: Carmen:I really want to wear a gown designed by Jason Wu on a red carpet someday.
sentences.chinese: 我也好希望能穿上吳季剛設計的禮服步上紅毯喔。

sentences.english: The star-studded cast on the red carpet is another highlight.
sentences.chinese: 而星光熠熠的紅毯又是另一個亮點。

sentences.english: Fan Bingbing is one star you can always rely on to bring elegance to the red carpet.
sentences.chinese: 范冰冰就是一顆永遠在紅毯帶來優雅的明星。

sentences.english: Runways, red carpets, and glossy magazine spreads have all been inundated with the look.
sentences.chinese: T臺，紅毯，浮誇的雜誌上都被這樣的打扮淹沒了。

sentences.english: I tell her I will never, ever walk down any aisle -- ever.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴她我絕不會走下那條紅毯，絕對不會。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
